text: Mehrdad Hedayatian (, born 2 November 1997) is an Iranian footballer who plays as a winger who currently plays for Iranian club Foolad in the Persian Gulf Pro League. ==Club career== ===Foolad=== He made his debut for Foolad in 2nd fixtures of 2017–18 Iran Pro League against Naft Tehran. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian footballers Category:Foolad FC players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Mehrdad Hedayatian
